price: Muulizaji aliuliza juu ya adhabu itakayo tokea!
footnotes: Ameita, mwenye kuita, kuhimiza kama kufanya kejeli, iletwe upesi adhabu kutoka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu ambayo hapana shaka itawashukia makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
